popular_destinations.name: Caracas
popular_destinations.description: Caracas, officially Santiago de León de Caracas, is the capital and centre of the Greater Caracas Area, and the largest city of Venezuela.

popular_destinations.name: Petare
popular_destinations.description: Petare is a city in Miranda, Venezuela, and is part of the urban area of Caracas.

popular_destinations.name: Puerto Cabello
popular_destinations.description: Puerto Cabello is a city on the north coast of Venezuela. It is located in Carabobo State, about 210 km west of Caracas.

popular_destinations.name: Barquisimeto
popular_destinations.description: Barquisimeto is a city in Venezuela. It is the capital of the state of Lara and head of Iribarren Municipality.

popular_destinations.name: Ciudad Bolívar
popular_destinations.description: Ciudad Bolívar, formerly known as Angostura, is the capital of Venezuela's southeastern Bolívar State.

popular_destinations.name: San Cristóbal, Táchira
popular_destinations.description: San Cristóbal is the capital city of the Venezuelan state of Táchira. It is located in a mountainous region of Western Venezuela.

popular_destinations.name: Guasdualito
popular_destinations.description: Guasdualito is a city and episcopal see in the landlocked Apure State, in southern Venezuela.

popular_destinations.name: Guarenas
popular_destinations.description: Guarenas is a city in Miranda, Venezuela. It was established in 1621 as Nuestra Señora de Copacabana de los Guarenas.

popular_destinations.name: Valencia
popular_destinations.description: Valencia is the capital city of Carabobo State, and the third largest city in Venezuela.

popular_destinations.name: Porlamar
popular_destinations.description: Porlamar is the largest city on Isla Margarita, Nueva Esparta State in Venezuela.

popular_destinations.name: Barinas, Barinas
popular_destinations.description: Barinas is a city in west central Venezuela. According to the 2011 census, its population is 353,442.

popular_destinations.name: Puerto la Cruz
popular_destinations.description: Puerto La Cruz is a port city located in Anzoátegui State, in Venezuela. It is the seat of the Juan Antonio Sotillo Municipality.

popular_destinations.name: Charallave
popular_destinations.description: Charallave is a city in the state of Miranda, Venezuela, and part of Miranda's Valles del Tuy region.

points_of_interest.name: Angel Falls
points_of_interest.description: Angel Falls is a waterfall in Venezuela.

points_of_interest.name: Port of Coro
points_of_interest.description: Coro is the capital of Falcón State and the oldest city in the west of Venezuela.

points_of_interest.description: The University City of  Caracas is the main Campus of the Central University of Venezuela.

points_of_interest.name: National Panthenon
points_of_interest.description: The National Pantheon of Venezuela is a final resting place for national heroes.

points_of_interest.description: Bolívar Square in Caracas is one of the most important and recognized Venezuelan public spaces.
